snippet: Toward the end of an exhibition match against Maria Sharapova, Caroline Wozniacki summoned Rory McIlroy, her boyfriend, from the stands and handed him her racket.
abstract: Toward the end of an exhibition match against Maria Sharapova, Caroline Wozniacki summoned Rory McIlroy, her boyfriend, from the stands and handed him her racket.

headline.main: McIlroy the Golfer Takes a Shot at Tennis
